experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description: Building innovative mobile intelligence solutions and contributing to cutting-edge frontend development projects.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description:
- Led development and deployment of full-stack AI projects leveraging ChatGPT services, TypeScript, and Next.js, managing the complete lifecycle from development to production deployment.
- Architected and built a full-stack AI translation system integrated with CrownPeak CMS, utilizing modern technologies including Hono, React, Redis, and PostgreSQL.
- Spearheaded modernization of legacy Vue 2 application by migrating to Vite build system, updating dependencies, and implementing performance optimizations that significantly improved code quality and build times.
- Engineered and maintained 100+ complex CMS components across 4 CrownPeak CMS projects, demonstrating expertise in component-driven architecture and enterprise content management systems.
- Conducted R&D initiatives and proof-of-concepts for cutting-edge technologies including component-based asset injection, Lit web components, and headless CMS architectures to modernize legacy systems.
- Provided technical leadership through accurate project estimations, mentoring new team members during onboarding, conducting comprehensive code reviews, and evaluating emerging technologies for client implementations.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description:
- Architected and executed complete migration of company website to Vue.js and Bootstrap framework, establishing modern architecture patterns and significantly improving application performance.
- Seamlessly integrated marketing analytics and monitoring tools while maintaining optimal performance standards and ensuring all functionality remained intact.
- Achieved remarkable performance improvements, increasing Lighthouse scores from 60 to 90+, while implementing comprehensive SEO optimizations that enhanced search engine visibility.
- Led end-to-end development of parent and student portal applications, ensuring architectural consistency and maintaining code quality standards across all platforms.
- Implemented Sentry error monitoring and tracking system, resulting in an 83% reduction in production bugs and significantly improving overall user experience and application reliability.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description:
- Contributed to large-scale e-commerce platform and internal ERP systems built with Vue.js, supporting high-traffic customer-facing applications and business-critical operations.
- Developed and maintained critical e-commerce features including shopping cart, checkout flow, accounting integration, order management, and customer service modules.
- Collaborated effectively in cross-functional teams with designers, product managers, and backend engineers, gaining valuable experience in distributed system architectures and microservices communication.
- Adapted to remote work environment while mastering agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban), implementing responsive design patterns, and applying UX best practices to enhance user experience across all touchpoints.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.description:
- Built three enterprise applications from the ground up: reybex Mobile, reybex Hand Terminal, and reybex B2B Shop, while maintaining ownership of the reybex Sales Person mobile application.
- Leveraged modern JavaScript ecosystem including Nuxt.js, Vue.js, React Native, Feathers.js, and Socket.io to deliver real-time, cross-platform solutions for cloud ERP system.
- Demonstrated exceptional productivity and code quality by reviewing 250+ merge requests and contributing 2,500+ commits across all reybex internal projects within one year.
- Played key role in technical decision-making and architecture planning, ensuring scalability and maintainability of all developed applications.

experiences.title: Fullstack Intern
experiences.company: BGS Bireysel Gelişim İnteraktif Sis. A.Ş
experiences.description:
- Contributed to EYSIS, a full-stack enterprise application built with Phalcon PHP Framework and MySQL on the backend, integrated with Vue.js and Vuetify for modern, responsive user interfaces.
- Containerized entire development workflow using Docker, streamlining the development process and ensuring consistency across different environments.
- Gained foundational experience in Linux-based development environments and version control with Git, establishing strong software engineering practices early in career.
